title: Goat Milk Recipe- Replacer Milk | How to feed your Baby Goat/What I use | Mom of 10

tasks.task: Prepare goat milk formula for feedings.
subtasks: Measure whole milk, buttermilk, and evaporated milk.
Mix ingredients in a gallon container.
Pour mixed milk into bottles for feeding.
Prepare feeding schedule for baby goats.
Administer vitamin or supplement to baby goats (as shown in the video, but not detailed).
Fill bottles with the prepared milk formula.
Manage feeding sessions based on each goat's need.

tasks.task: Monitor goat behavior and health during feeding.
subtasks: Address any issues during feeding (e.g., choking, difficulty drinking).
Adjust feeding methods as needed (e.g., using different bottles, schedules).
